text: neohuiga neohui jidojaleul doul su eobsda haedo hananimkkeseo geubun-eul dousini bulsinjadeul-i geubun-eul chubang haess-eul ttaedo geulaessneunila geubunkkeseo hanmyeong-ui dongbanjawa dong-gul-an-e iss-eoss-eulttaegeuui donglyoege illeogalodoe seulpeohaji malla hananim-i uliwa hamkke hasim-ila geulihayeo hananim-eun geubun-ege pyeong-an-eul jusigo neohuiga boji moshaneun gundaelo geuleul jiwonhasa bulsin jadeul-ui gyomanhan eonhaeng-eul kkeokk-eusyeoss-eumyeohananim-ui malsseum-i nop-i iss-eoss-euni hananim-eun ganghasigo hyeonmyeonghasinola
